sh ri lanka uthuru dumriya margayehi awasana gamananthaya kankasanthure weyi. 1990 warshaya dakwa, yal dewiya kankasanthure dakwa gaman gaththada, siwil yudha gatum athiwima hethuwen, dumriya gamana wawniyawa dakwa sima keruni. 2009 wasaredi yudha gatum nima wimath samaga, warthamanaye nawathath kankasanthure dakwa wu uthuru dumriya maga pilisakara karamin pawathiyi.

kasbawa mathiwarana kottasaye thunbowila pradeshaye konkriti yoda prathisanskaranaya karana lada marga wyapruthi dekak janatha ayithiyata path kirima shri lanka nidahas pakshaye kasbawa sanwidhayaka kamkaru ha kamkaru amathi gamini lokuge mahatha athin pasugiyada sidu kerini.medina eka gamakata eka wadak yana wadasatahana yatathe thunbowila waw hena parada kasbawa nagara sabhawa magin thumbowila weda mawathe 6 wana patumagada janatha ayithiyata pawarini.pasugiyada palath palana mathiwaranayedi kasbawa nagara sabhawata eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayen tharanga kala asanka dayas mahathage yojanawak anuwa me marga wyapruthiya sandaha rupiyal laksha 15 k waya kara thibuni.basnahira palath sabha manthri ke.
me lesa thawath idiriyata gos apa baluwoth apata anumana kala hakke sabawinma abhiyogayata lakwa aththe puwathpathe mudritha pitapatha pamanak wana bawayi.

aya ema awawadayehi pihita siw pilisimbaiya arhath bhawaya labuwa ya.arhath bhawaya laba thamage ma kriya patipatiya awalokanaya karanni udana washayen me gi prakasha kala ya.siwweni wara pasweni wara wiharayen nikma giyemi sithe shanthiya noma laba belasun sitha ekanga nowini ma wisin adahiya yuthu wu sadahathi yam mehenak weda ethumiya wetha giyemi bathini kanda piliwela – da pilibanda desuha oo dahamak mata ee mehena mata dun owadan asa suwaya sitha purawa eka digata ma sath dawasak eka palangaka hunnem mama mohanduru kanda pala giye atawana dina pa digukara sahalluwata hinda gaththemikusum disanayaka
